com.jaxson.lib.gdx

Class GameConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jaxson.lib.util.GsonObject<GameConfig>
      • com.jaxson.lib.gdx.GameConfig

  • public class GameConfig
extends GsonObject<GameConfig>
    A universal config file that can be converted to other config types. Such as AndroidApplicationConfiguration or LwjglApplicationConfiguration.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jaxson Van Doorn

        Parameters:
        width - The width of the window
        height - The height of the window
        fps - The target fps of the Game
        step - The interval between Game logic updates in milliseconds
